products.title: Hopsack Mercury Curtain
products.description: Their rustic hopsack range offers you a natural textured fabric which combines tradition with a contemporary feel. These classic grey curtains have an attractive textured finish and will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Product id: db-cur0825 fabric colour: mercury material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes hopsack mercury curtain in grey.

products.title: Faux Suede Mercury Curtain
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede mercury curtain in a lovely grey colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-cur0775 fabric colour: mercury material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes faux suede mercury curtain in grey.
